snippet: The 12 African countries that receive most of the American taxpayer dollars spent fighting AIDS could do much more to pay their own way, according to a study published in The Lancet.
abstract: Study published in The Lancet Global Health concludes that 12 African countries that receive largest share of American taxpayer dollars spent fighting AIDS could shoulder much more of financial burden themselves.
lead_paragraph: The 12 African countries that receive most of the American taxpayer dollars spent fighting AIDS could do much more to pay their own way, according to a study published in The Lancet.

headline.print_headline: African Nations Can Help More on AIDS, Study Says
headline.main: African Nations Can Help More on AIDS, Study Says
